name: One To Go
description:
The mother is dead. Escape?

============ Start of zone of PAY ATTENTION PLEASE xD ===========

Once the game is loaded (splash screen with a child, play and credits), click and use keyboard arrows to select and Enter/Return to confirm.

============ End of zone of PAY ATTENTION PLEASE xD ===========


This game was made in the Global Game Jam of 2014 with the theme "We don't see things as they are, we see things as we are."

It's a platformer-puzzle and you need to choose 5 actions to do in sequence. You can go Right, Left, Up, Combine actions (C) or juste Wait (W).

Have fun!
